item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, January 3, 2025 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. UK ICO response to Google's policy change on device fingerprinting (91 points | 54 comments)
2. Digital gardens people maintain outside the "Big Tech" walled gardens (184 points | 49 comments)
3. Gource: Software Version Control Visualization (19 points | 14 comments)

7. Advent of Code 2024 in pure SQL (348 points | 82 comments)
8. JPL Horizons on-line solar system data and ephemeris computation service (35 points | 4 comments)
9. Laser mapping reveals oldest Amazonian cities, built 2500 years ago (28 points | 8 comments)
10. Ask HN: How to learn marketing and sales as a solo entrepreneur? (210 points | 58 comments)
11. Optimizing Ruby's JSON, Part 4 (146 points | 17 comments)
12. Shmøergh Hog – The making of a simple analog synth (113 points | 3 comments)

21. Rules for writing software tutorials (218 points | 46 comments)
22. Postgres UUIDv7 and per-back end monotonicity (200 points | 93 comments)
23. Be a property owner and not a renter on the internet (266 points | 162 comments)
24. uBlock Origin GPL code being stolen by team behind honey browser extension (805 points | 352 comments)
25. I am rich and have no idea what to do (629 points | 1030 comments)
26. Multispectral imaging through scattering media and around corners (15 points | discuss)
27. What Is miniKanren? (214 points | 112 comments)
28. Building a Knowledge System That Enhances Rather Than Replaces Thought (103 points | 30 comments)
29. UpCodes (YC S17) is hiring remote recruiters to help make buildings cheaper ( | hide)
30. U.S. appeals court strikes down FCC's net neutrality rules (247 points | 209 comments)
